survmod:Adaptability.NAME: Adaptability
survmod:Adaptability.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a survmod:Trap is Activated, draw !M! card.
survmod:Adaptability.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a survmod:Trap is Activated, draw !M! cards.

survmod:BearTrap.NAME: Bear Trap
survmod:BearTrap.DESCRIPTION: Make a survmod:Bear_Trap with !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

survmod:DuckAndFlare.NAME: Duck and Flare
survmod:DuckAndFlare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Flare into your hand.
survmod:DuckAndFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Flares into your hand.

survmod:FindCover.NAME: Find Cover
survmod:FindCover.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at Long Range. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL ALL enemies gain 1 Intangible.

survmod:HailOfArrows.NAME: Hail of Arrows
survmod:HailOfArrows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL Lose 1 survmod:Distance.
survmod:HailOfArrows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X+1 times. NL Lose 1 survmod:Distance.

survmod:LongShot.NAME: Long Shot
survmod:LongShot.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at Long Range. NL Deal !D! damage.

survmod:MarkedShot.NAME: Marked Shot
survmod:MarkedShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

survmod:NockAnArrow.NAME: Nock an Arrow
survmod:NockAnArrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If an enemy has Mark, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

survmod:PinningSnipe.NAME: Pinning Snipe
survmod:PinningSnipe.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at Long Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak.

survmod:QuickDash.NAME: Quick Dash
survmod:QuickDash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at Close Range. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 2 survmod:Distance. NL Gain 2 survmod:Advantage.

survmod:SimpleMutation.NAME: Simple Mutation
survmod:SimpleMutation.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise, gain !M! Artifact and deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Injury into your discard pile.

survmod:SkillfulManeuver.NAME: Skillful Maneuver
survmod:SkillfulManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 survmod:Distance. Next turn, gain [E] . NL Add 2 Dazed into your discard pile.
survmod:SkillfulManeuver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 survmod:Distance. Next turn, gain [E] [E] . NL Add 2 Dazed into your discard pile.

survmod:Sprint.NAME: Sprint
survmod:Sprint.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 survmod:Distance. NL Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 Dazed into your discard pile.

survmod:SwiftKick.NAME: Swift Kick
survmod:SwiftKick.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at Close Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain 2 Advantage.

survmod:TwinShot.NAME: Twin Shot
survmod:TwinShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy twice. NL Lose 2 survmod:Distance.

survmod:UnfortunateEscape.NAME: Unfortunate Escape
survmod:UnfortunateEscape.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 2 *Slimed into your hand.

survmod:VersatileDefense.NAME: Versatile Defense
survmod:VersatileDefense.DESCRIPTION: Has different effects depending on your survmod:Distance.

survmod:VersatileOffense.NAME: Versatile Offense
survmod:VersatileOffense.DESCRIPTION: Has different effects depending on your survmod:Distance.

survmod:ComplexMutation.NAME: Complex Mutation
survmod:ComplexMutation.DESCRIPTION: Effect varies based on enemy Intent. NL Exhaust.

survmod:AcidArrow.NAME: Acid Arrow
survmod:AcidArrow.DESCRIPTION: Remove the enemy's Block. NL Remove all Artifact. NL Apply 4 Poison, !M! Weak, and !M! Vulnerable.

survmod:FlareBarrage.NAME: Flare Barrage
survmod:FlareBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Mark to ALL enemies X times. NL Lose X survmod:Distance.

survmod:TakeAim.NAME: Take Aim
survmod:TakeAim.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, your next Attack deals !M! additional damage. NL Lose 1 survmod:Distance.

survmod:AimForTheLiver.NAME: Aim For The Liver
survmod:AimForTheLiver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you Activate a Trap, increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

survmod:PiercingShot.NAME: Piercing Shot
survmod:PiercingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose 1 survmod:Distance.

survmod:Heartseeker.NAME: Heartseeker
survmod:Heartseeker.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at Long Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Skip your next turn. NL Exhaust.

survmod:EscapeMechanism.NAME: Escape Mechanism
survmod:EscapeMechanism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Trap is Activated, gain 2 survmod:Distance.

survmod:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
survmod:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Trap is Activated, gain [E] .
survmod:Exploit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Trap is Activated, gain [E] [E] .

survmod:BendAndBow.NAME: Bend and Bow
survmod:BendAndBow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Lose 2 survmod:Distance.

survmod:FlareQuiver.NAME: Flare Quiver
survmod:FlareQuiver.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, apply 4 Mark.

survmod:FlashbangShot.NAME: Flashbang Shot
survmod:FlashbangShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Mark to ALL enemies.

survmod:GoForFace.NAME: Go for Face!
survmod:GoForFace.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, deal !M! damage to the enemy with the highest HP.

survmod:HiddenTactic.NAME: Hidden Tactic
survmod:HiddenTactic.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played while in Long Range. NL Gain 1 Intangible. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose 3 survmod:Distance.

survmod:MarkedFromAfar.NAME: Marked from Afar
survmod:MarkedFromAfar.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played while in Long Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark twice. NL Lose 1 survmod:Distance.
survmod:MarkedFromAfar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can't be played in Close Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark twice. NL Lose 1 survmod:Distance.

survmod:Marksmanship.NAME: Marksmanship
survmod:Marksmanship.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Mark, increase the amount applied by !M!.

survmod:OverexertingShot.NAME: Overexerting Shot
survmod:OverexertingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Wounds into your hand. NL Lose 1 survmod:Distance.

survmod:PerfectPosition.NAME: Perfect Position
survmod:PerfectPosition.DESCRIPTION: Can't be played at Close Range. NL Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Perfect *Position into your hand. NL Exhaust.
survmod:PerfectPosition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Can't be played at Close Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Perfect *Position+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

survmod:PersonalMark.NAME: Personal Mark
survmod:PersonalMark.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at Close Range. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark. NL Take !M! damage. NL Gain 2 survmod:Distance.

survmod:RejectWeakness.NAME: Reject Weakness
survmod:RejectWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Status and Curse cards in your hand. NL Draw 1 card for each.

survmod:ShrapnelTraps.NAME: Shrapnel Traps
survmod:ShrapnelTraps.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you activate a survmod:Trap, gain !M! Temporary Thorns.

survmod:TacticalManeuver.NAME: Tactical Maneuver
survmod:TacticalManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Either gain or lose 3 survmod:Distance. NL Shuffle 1 *Dazed into your discard pile.

survmod:DesperateAmbush.NAME: Desperate Ambush
survmod:DesperateAmbush.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your survmod:Distance X times. NL Lose all survmod:Distance. NL You can't gain survmod:Distance next turn.
survmod:DesperateAmbush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your survmod:Distance 2X times. NL Lose all survmod:Distance. NL You can't gain survmod:Distance next turn.

survmod:TrickShot.NAME: Trick Shot
survmod:TrickShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL If they don't intend to attack, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

survmod:WalledOffTraps.NAME: Walled-Off Traps
survmod:WalledOffTraps.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you activate a survmod:Trap, gain !M! Block.

survmod:ConcussiveShot.NAME: Concussive Shot
survmod:ConcussiveShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Stun the enemy. NL Lose 3 survmod:Distance. NL Exhaust.

survmod:MutantEnergy.NAME: Mutant Energy
survmod:MutantEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse or Status card, gain [E] .

survmod:ChokingBow.NAME: Choking Bow
survmod:ChokingBow.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played while in Close Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Stun the enemy for 1 turn. NL You can no longer play Attacks this turn. NL Exhaust.

survmod:Decoy.NAME: Decoy
survmod:Decoy.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Trap Slot. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.
survmod:Decoy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Trap Slot. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP.

survmod:UnleashTheTraps.NAME: Unleash the Traps
survmod:UnleashTheTraps.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Activate all survmod:Traps. NL Exhaust.

survmod:KnowThyEnemy.NAME: Know Thy Enemy
survmod:KnowThyEnemy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each Mark on the enemy. NL Remove the enemy's Mark.

survmod:MutantForm.NAME: Mutant Form
survmod:MutantForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Flight. NL While Flying, you can't gain Block and don't lose survmod:Distance at the start of your turn.

survmod:ExpertSniper.NAME: Expert Sniper
survmod:ExpertSniper.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you're in Long Range, your first attack deals !M! extra damage.

survmod:MarkedForDeath.NAME: Marked for Death
survmod:MarkedForDeath.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses HP equal to 3 times their Mark. NL Remove the enemy's Mark. NL Exhaust.
survmod:MarkedForDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses HP equal to 3 times their Mark. NL Remove the enemy's Mark.

survmod:RobFromTheRich.NAME: Rob From The Rich
survmod:RobFromTheRich.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played while in Close Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Gold for each point of unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

survmod:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
survmod:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played while in Close Range. NL Draw !M! cards and reduce their costs by 1 this turn. NL Gain 2 survmod:Distance. NL Gain 2 survmod:Advantage.

survmod:CloseCombat.NAME: Close Combat
survmod:CloseCombat.DESCRIPTION: Each time you enter Close Range, gain !M! Strength and Dexterity.

survmod:Camouflage.NAME: Camouflage
survmod:Camouflage.DESCRIPTION: The first time you enter Long Range each turn, gain 1 Intangible.

survmod:EmptyQuiver.NAME: Empty Quiver
survmod:EmptyQuiver.DESCRIPTION: Play all Attacks in your hand. NL Add !M! *Wounds into your draw pile. NL You can't gain survmod:Distance next turn.

survmod:MercifulShot.NAME: Merciful Shot
survmod:MercifulShot.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Long Range. NL If the enemy has at least 50% of its health, it loses 33% of its health. NL Otherwise, deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
survmod:MercifulShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played in Long Range. NL If the enemy has at least 50% of its health, it loses 33% of its health. NL Otherwise, deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

survmod:DeadlyAim.NAME: Deadly Aim
survmod:DeadlyAim.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, Attacks deal 8 additional damage and trigger Mark. Exhaust.

survmod:NeedleShot.NAME: Needle Shot
survmod:NeedleShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Remove all enemy Block. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable. NL Lose 1 survmod:Distance.

survmod:LeapingShot.NAME: Leaping Shot
survmod:LeapingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 3 survmod:Distance. NL Shuffle 3 *Dazed into your draw pile.

survmod:BatteringStrike.NAME: Battering Strike
survmod:BatteringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Close Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 2 survmod:Distance. NL Shuffle 3 *Dazed into your draw pile.

survmod:Deadeye.NAME: Deadeye
survmod:Deadeye.DESCRIPTION: If you're in Long Range, deal double damage next turn.

survmod:Detonation.NAME: Detonation
survmod:Detonation.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Mark. NL Next turn, at the end of the enemy turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark. NL Exhaust.
survmod:Detonation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Mark. NL Next turn, at the end of the enemy turn, ALL enemies lose HP equal to twice their Mark. NL Exhaust.

survmod:PenetratingShot.NAME: Penetrating Shot
survmod:PenetratingShot.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played at Long Range. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Mark, apply 2 Vulnerable.

survmod:OverwhelmingAssault.NAME: Overwhelming Assault
survmod:OverwhelmingAssault.DESCRIPTION: While in Close Range, attacks apply !M! Weak.

survmod:CloseCall.NAME: Close Call
survmod:CloseCall.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Close Range. NL Gain !B! Block, increased by missing HP. NL Next turn, gain 3 Distance. NL Exhaust.
